text:
The Sardinian tree frog, Sardinia tree frog or Tyrrhenian tree frog ("Hyla sarda") is a frog. It lives on islands: Sardinia in Italy, Corsica in France and other islands nearby.
This frog is 3.8 to 4.0 cm long. It is green or gray with a dark stripe down each side of its body. This frog can change color.
This frog can live near humans. Sometimes it lives in gardens and hides in garden walls.
